Name: Mars Flight VR
About the game: Mars Flight VR is a helicopter simulator that lets you explore Jezero Crater, the landing site of Perseverance rover on mars. Take control of 'Ingenuity', the JPL Mars Helicopter Scout, a real helicopter designed to fly in the thin martian atmosphere. The game includes races and photography missions with Steam leaderboards. This is a seated VR experience which requires a gamepad to play.
Meta Title: Mars Flight VR: Jun 8, 2021, Io Normal and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Mars Flight VR? Check out the release date (Jun 8, 2021), developer insights from Io Normal, and a complete game summary.
